Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.account.AccountOptions

  • Packages that use AccountOptions 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.account  

    • Uses of AccountOptions in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Subinterfaces of AccountOptions in com.stormpath.sdk.account 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AccountCriteria
      An Account-specific Criteria class, enabling an Account-specific fluentquery DSL.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account that return AccountOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountOptions CreateAccountRequest.getAccountOptions()
      Returns the AccountOptions to be used in the CreateAccountRequest s to retrieve the account's references as part of Stormpath's response upon successful account creation.
      static AccountOptions<AccountOptions> Accounts.options()
      Returns a new AccountOptions instance, used to customize how one or more Accounts are retrieved.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account that return types with arguments of type AccountOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AccountOptions<AccountOptions> Accounts.options()
      Returns a new AccountOptions instance, used to customize how one or more Accounts are retrieved.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account with parameters of type AccountOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account Account.saveWithResponseOptions(AccountOptions responseOptions)
      Saves this Account resource and ensures the returned Account response reflects the specified options.
      CreateAccountRequestBuilder CreateAccountRequestBuilder.withResponseOptions(AccountOptions options)
      Ensures that after a Account is created, the creation response is retrieved with the specified account's options.
